Package com.comp3607.strategies

package com.comp3607.strategies
Strategy pattern implementations for answer validation and scoring.

Overview

This package provides different strategies for validating player answers and calculating points based on question categories or difficulty levels.

Design Pattern

Strategy Pattern: CategoryStrategy defines the interface for answer validation and point calculation. Concrete implementations can apply different rules for different question categories.

Available Strategies

  • VariableStrategy - Standard validation and scoring
  • ControlStructureStrategy - Control structure questions
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
